meanings.definition: The action of pulling or tearing away.
meanings.sent1: The avulsion of the poster from the wall left a mark.
meanings.sent2: The avulsion of the tree's roots during the storm caused it to fall.
meanings.sent3: The avulsion of the bandage startled the patient.
meanings.sent4: The avulsion of trust between them was irreversible.
meanings.sent5: The avulsion of the fabric revealed a hidden compartment.
